C G I N S T

C

ClockDisplay - class ClockDisplay.
The ClockDisplay class implements a digital clock display for a European-style 24 hour clock.
ClockDisplay() - Constructor for class ClockDisplay
Constructor for ClockDisplay objects.
ClockDisplay(int, int) - Constructor for class ClockDisplay
Constructor for ClockDisplay objects.

G

getDisplayValue() - Method in class NumberDisplay
Return the display value (that is, the current value as a two-digit String.
getTime() - Method in class ClockDisplay
Return the current time of this display in the format HH:MM.
getValue() - Method in class NumberDisplay
Return the current value.

I

increment() - Method in class NumberDisplay
Increment the display value by one, rolling over to zero if the limit is reached.

N

NumberDisplay - class NumberDisplay.
The NumberDisplay class represents a digital number display that can hold values from zero to a given limit.
NumberDisplay(int) - Constructor for class NumberDisplay
Constructor for objects of class Display

S

setTime(int, int) - Method in class ClockDisplay
Set the time of the display to the specified hour and minute.
setValue(int) - Method in class NumberDisplay
Set the value of the display to the new specified value.

T

timeTick() - Method in class ClockDisplay
This method should get called once every minute - it makes the clock display go one minute forward.
